alert.note: Alert for Susquehanna (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 5:55PM EDT until September 09 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Susquehanna County in northeastern Pennsylvania... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 555 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hop Bottom, or 7 miles southeast of Montrose, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Springville, Montrose, Dimock, Harford, Hallstead, New Milford, Hop Bottom, Glenwood, South Montrose, and Elk Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
